markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diverse Armor Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=693) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 223 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Champion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=4)

**Prerequisites**
[Champion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=686); expert in unarmored defense or one or more types of armor

</column>

---

Your proficiency ranks for light armor, medium armor, heavy armor, and unarmored defense increase to expert.
name: Diverse Armor Expert
prerequisite: Champion Dedication; expert in unarmored defense or one or more types of armor
